data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Chen, Ssu-Li, Shih, Hsi-Te (2017): Descriptions of three new species of the harvestmen genus Pseudogagrella (Opiliones: Sclerosomatidae: Gagrellinae) from Taiwan, supported by morphological and molecular evidence. Zootaxa 4268 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4268.1.2|19 occurrences
